name: Meta
description: A leading social media and technology company, connecting billions of users globally through its platform.

name: Google
description: A multinational technology company specializing in Internet-related services.

name: Microsoft
description: A technology company that develops, licenses, and supports a wide range of software products.

name: Mozilla
description: An organization dedicated to promoting an open and accessible Internet.

name: Apache Software Foundation
description: A nonprofit organization supporting numerous open-source software projects.

name: Node.js

name: TensorFlow
description: An open-source machine learning framework developed by Google.

name: Kubernetes
description: An open-source system for automating the deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.
